text: Nicolás Almagro was the defending champion, but lost in the quarterfinals to Pablo Carreño Busta. Carreño Busta went on to win the title, defeating Gilles Müller in the final, 6–2, 7–6(7–5). ==Seeds== The top four seeds receive a bye into the second round. ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==Qualifying== ===Seeds=== ===Qualifiers=== ===Qualifying draw=== ====First qualifier==== ====Second qualifier==== ====Third qualifier==== ====Fourth qualifier==== ==References== * Main Draw * Qualifying Draw Singles
title: 2017 Estoril Open – Singles
